mapper.select: select terms.id, terms.title, terms.content, terms.cat,terms.createTime,terms.author from terms order by terms.createTime desc limit 0,20
mapper.insert: insert into terms (title, content, cat, author, createTime) values (#{title},#{content},#{cat},#{author},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update terms set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, cat=#{cat}, author=#{author} where id = #{id}
